sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"损害，伤害"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: hurt, injure, wound, harm, damage, disable
means: hurt ： 普通用词，较口语化，侧重指给有生命的东西造成机体上或精神、感情上的或轻或重的伤害。
injure较hurt正式，多用于有生命的事物。既可指伤害别人的事物。即可指伤害别人的健康、外貌、自尊心、名誉等，又可指使别人受伤或东西受损，同时含有受伤害部分至少暂时丧失功能的意味。
wound ： 专指对身体的重伤，尤指在战斗中受的伤，强调外部创伤；也可指精神方面的伤害。
harm ： 主要用于有生命的东西，语气略强于injure，指引起严重的痛苦和损伤；有时也用于抽象事物，指造成任何不良后果。
damage ： 通常指对无生命物体的损害，并有降低其价值，破坏其功能等的后果。

sentence.Network_en: One bomb can disable a ship.
sentence.Network_cn: 一颗炸弹就能炸毁一艘船.

sentence.Network_en: Job applications from disable workers poured in at a staggering rate.

sentence.Network_en: Disable menu items when they are not applicable.

encyclopedia.content: 单词 disable[dis'eibl]vt. 1. 使失去能力[(+from)] 2. 使伤残[H] He was disabled in the accident. 他在那次事故中成了残废。 3. 【律】使无资格[(+from)] He is disabled from voting. 他失去了选举资格。C函数 函数名： disable 功 能： 屏蔽中断 用 法： void disable(void); 程序例： /***NOTE: This is an interrupt service routine. You cannot compile this program with Test Stack Overflow turned on and get an exe

entry.def: If an injury or illness disables someone, it affects them so badly that it restricts the way that they can live their life.

example.ex: She did all this tendon damage and it really disabled her...
example.tran: 她遭受这么严重的肌腱损伤，这实际上让她残废了。

example.ex: Although disabled by polio during the Second World War, Proctor was also a first-rate helmsman.
example.tran: 二战期间尽管身患小儿麻痹症，普罗克特仍不失为一流的舵手。

entry.tran: （通常指暂时地）使无效，使不能正常运转
entry.def: If someone or something disables a system or mechanism, they stop it working, usually temporarily.

example.ex: ...if you need to disable a car alarm.
example.tran: 如果你需要暂停汽车报警功能

means.word_mean: 1. make unable to perform a certain action;

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有[能力、时间、知识等]做某事,有本事的
stems_affixes.word_buile: abl能力→adj.有[能力、时间、知识等]做某事,有本事的
un无+able有能力的→adj.不能的, 不会的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使残废, 使失去能力, 丧失能力
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis去掉+able有能力的→v.使残废, 使失去能力, 丧失能力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使能够, 授予权利或方法
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……+able有能力的→v.使能够, 授予权利或方法

Sentence.sentence: In one 1990s experiment, a team including psychologist Joel Cooper of Princeton asked participants to write essays opposing funding for the disabled.
Writer friends of mine pay good money to get the Freedom software that enables them to disable the very Internet connections that seemed so emancipating not long ago.

The plane was critically disabled when one of the engines caught fire.
